nodes.text: The Tiss'sharl League was the governing body of Tiss'sharl. A consortium of the Tiss'shar leaders of the five companies that reported the highest profits in the previous five local years, it consisted of a President and his Vice President along with several League Councilors and Officers. It had been established at least since 1000 BBY.

Around eight months after the Battle of Yavin, Si-Di-Ri held the position of President of the Tiss'sharl League, while Geor-Dan-Thi was Vice-President, having rapidly climbed to that position following the suspicious deaths of Mayor Antha-Kres, Secretary Lai-O-Sid, and Vice President Astre-De-Kay. Following an visit by Lord Darth Vader and an assassination attempt, Si-Di-Ri resigned, leaving the position open for the ambitious Geor-Dan-Thi.
The successful businessbeing San-kur-lor was also a constituent of the League.
